verses.text: Again the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, cause \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* her \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*,

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; Thy \w birth|strong="H4351"\w* and thy \w nativity|strong="H4138"\w* \add is\add* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3669"\w*; thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \add was\add* an \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*, and thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* an \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*.\f + \fr 16.3 \ft birth: Heb. cutting out, or, habitation\f*

And \add as for\add* thy \w nativity|strong="H4138"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* thou wast \w born|strong="H3205"\w* thy \w navel|strong="H8270"\w* was not \w cut|strong="H3772"\w*, neither wast thou \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w* to \w supple|strong="H4935"\w* \add thee;\add* thou wast not \w salted|strong="H4414"\w* at \w all|strong="H4414"\w*, nor \w swaddled|strong="H2853"\w* at \w all|strong="H2853"\w*.\f + \fr 16.4 \ft to supple…: or, when I looked upon thee\f*

None \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w pitied|strong="H2347"\w* thee, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* of these unto thee, to have \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* upon thee; but thou wast cast \w out|strong="H7993"\w* in the \w open|strong="H6440"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, to the \w lothing|strong="H1604"\w* of thy \w person|strong="H5315"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that thou wast \w born|strong="H3205"\w*.

¶ And when I \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by thee, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* thee \w polluted|strong="H0947"\w* in thine own \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee \add when thou wast\add* in thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w Live|strong="H2421"\w*; yea, I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto thee \add when thou wast\add* in thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w Live|strong="H2421"\w*.\f + \fr 16.6 \ft polluted: or, trodden under foot\f*

I have \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* thee to \w multiply|strong="H7233"\w* as the \w bud|strong="H6780"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and thou hast \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* and waxen \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, and thou art \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w excellent|strong="H5716"\w* \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w*: \add thy\add* \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* are \w fashioned|strong="H3559"\w*, and thine \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* is \w grown|strong="H6779"\w*, whereas thou \add wast\add* \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* and \w bare|strong="H6181"\w*.\f + \fr 16.7 \ft caused…: Heb. made thee a million\f*\f + \fr 16.7 \ft excellent…: Heb. ornament of ornaments\f*

Now when I \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* by thee, and \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* upon thee, behold, thy \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add was\add* the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w love|strong="H1730"\w*; and I \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* my \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* over thee, and \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*: yea, I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thee, and \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, and thou becamest mine.

Then \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* I thee with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; yea, I throughly washed \w away|strong="H7857"\w* thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* from thee, and I \w anointed|strong="H5480"\w* thee with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.\f + \fr 16.9 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

I \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* thee also with broidered \w work|strong="H7553"\w*, and \w shod|strong="H5274"\w* thee with \w badgers’ skin|strong="H8476"\w*, and I \w girded|strong="H2280"\w* thee about with fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and I \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* thee with \w silk|strong="H4897"\w*.

I \w decked|strong="H5710"\w* thee also with \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w*, and I \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w bracelets|strong="H6781"\w* upon thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and a \w chain|strong="H7242"\w* on thy \w neck|strong="H1627"\w*.

And I \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w jewel|strong="H5141"\w* on thy \w forehead|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w earrings|strong="H5694"\w* in thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and a \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* upon thine \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.\f + \fr 16.12 \ft forehead: Heb. nose\f*

Thus wast thou \w decked|strong="H5710"\w* with \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; and thy \w raiment|strong="H4403"\w* \add was of\add* fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and \w silk|strong="H4897"\w*, and broidered \w work|strong="H7553"\w*; thou didst \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*: and thou wast \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3302"\w*, and thou didst \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* into a \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w*.

And thy \w renown|strong="H8034"\w* went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* for thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*: for it \add was\add* \w perfect|strong="H3632"\w* through my \w comeliness|strong="H1926"\w*, which I had \w put|strong="H7760"\w* upon thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

¶ But thou didst \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in thine own \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, and playedst the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* because of thy \w renown|strong="H8034"\w*, and pouredst \w out|strong="H8210"\w* thy \w fornications|strong="H8457"\w* on every one that passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*; his it was.

And of thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* thou didst \w take|strong="H3947"\w*, and \w deckedst|strong="H6213"\w* thy high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* with divers \w colours|strong="H2921"\w*, and playedst the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* thereupon: \add the like things\add* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, neither shall it be \add so\add*.

Thou hast also \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w fair|strong="H8597"\w* \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w* of my \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and of my \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, which I had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, and \w madest|strong="H6213"\w* to thyself \w images|strong="H6754"\w* of \w men|strong="H2145"\w*, and didst commit \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w* with them,\f + \fr 16.17 \ft of men: Heb. of a male\f*

And \w tookest|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w broidered|strong="H7553"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w coveredst|strong="H3680"\w* them: and thou hast \w set|strong="H5414"\w* mine \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* and mine \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.

My \w meat|strong="H3899"\w* also which I \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee, fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \add wherewith\add* I \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* thee, thou hast even \w set|strong="H5414"\w* it \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*: and \add thus\add* it was, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 16.19 \ft a sweet…: Heb. a savour of rest\f*

Moreover thou hast \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, whom thou hast \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* unto me, and these hast thou \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* unto them to be \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*. \add Is this\add* of thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* a small \w matter|strong="H4592"\w*,\f + \fr 16.20 \ft to be…: Heb. to devour\f*
That thou hast \w slain|strong="H7819"\w* my \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them to cause them to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \add the fire\add* for them?

And in all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* and thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* thou hast not \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, when thou wast \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* and \w bare|strong="H6181"\w*, \add and\add* wast \w polluted|strong="H0947"\w* in thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

And it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* all thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*, (\w woe|strong="H0188"\w*, \w woe|strong="H0188"\w* unto thee! \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*;)

\add That\add* thou hast also \w built|strong="H1129"\w* unto thee an eminent \w place|strong="H1354"\w*, and hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee an high \w place|strong="H7413"\w* in every \w street|strong="H7339"\w*.\f + \fr 16.24 \ft eminent…: or, brothel house\f*

Thou hast \w built|strong="H1129"\w* thy high \w place|strong="H7413"\w* at every \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and hast made thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* to be \w abhorred|strong="H8581"\w*, and hast \w opened|strong="H6589"\w* thy \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* to every one that passed \w by|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*.

Thou hast also committed \w fornication|strong="H2181"\w* with the \w Egyptians|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, \w great|strong="H1432"\w* of \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*; and hast \w increased|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*, to provoke me to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*.

Behold, therefore I have stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* my \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* over thee, and have \w diminished|strong="H1639"\w* thine \w ordinary|strong="H2706"\w* \add food\add*, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* thee unto the \w will|strong="H5315"\w* of them that \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee, the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, which are \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* of thy \w lewd|strong="H2154"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 16.27 \ft daughters: or, cities\f*

Thou hast played the \w whore|strong="H2181"\w* also with the \w Assyrians|strong="H1121"\w*, \w because|strong="H1115"\w* thou wast \w unsatiable|strong="H7646"\w*; yea, thou hast played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* with them, and yet couldest not be \w satisfied|strong="H7654"\w*.

Thou hast moreover \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thy \w fornication|strong="H8457"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w* unto \w Chaldea|strong="H3778"\w*; and yet thou wast not \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w* \w herewith|strong="H2063"\w*.

How \w weak|strong="H0535"\w* is thine \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, seeing thou \w doest|strong="H6213"\w* all these \add things\add*, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of an \w imperious|strong="H7986"\w* \w whorish|strong="H2181"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*;

In that thou \w buildest|strong="H1129"\w* thine eminent \w place|strong="H1354"\w* in the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of every \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w makest|strong="H6213"\w* thine high \w place|strong="H7413"\w* in every \w street|strong="H7339"\w*; and hast not been as an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, in that thou \w scornest|strong="H7046"\w* \w hire|strong="H0868"\w*;\f + \fr 16.31 \ft In that thou buildest…: or, In thy daughters is thine, etc\f*

\add But as\add* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* that committeth \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w*, \add which\add* \w taketh|strong="H3947"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* instead of her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*!

They \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w gifts|strong="H5078"\w* to all \w whores|strong="H2181"\w*: but thou \w givest|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w gifts|strong="H5083"\w* to all thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, and \w hirest|strong="H7809"\w* them, that they may \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w* for thy \w whoredom|strong="H8457"\w*.\f + \fr 16.33 \ft hirest: Heb. bribest\f*

And the \w contrary|strong="H2016"\w* is in thee from \add other\add* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* in thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w*, whereas none \w followeth|strong="H0310"\w* thee to commit \w whoredoms|strong="H2181"\w*: and in that thou \w givest|strong="H5414"\w* a \w reward|strong="H0868"\w*, and no \w reward|strong="H0868"\w* is \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thee, therefore thou \w art|strong="H1961"\w* \w contrary|strong="H2016"\w*.
¶ Wherefore, O \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thy \w filthiness|strong="H5178"\w* was poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w*, and thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w* through thy \w whoredoms|strong="H8457"\w* with thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, and with all the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w* of thy \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, and by the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, which thou didst \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto them;

Behold, therefore I will \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* all thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, with whom thou hast taken \w pleasure|strong="H6149"\w*, and all \add them\add* that thou hast \w loved|strong="H0157"\w*, with all \add them\add* that thou hast \w hated|strong="H8130"\w*; I will even \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* them round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* against thee, and will \w discover|strong="H1540"\w* thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w* unto them, that they may \w see|strong="H7200"\w* all thy \w nakedness|strong="H6172"\w*.

And I will \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thee, as women that break \w wedlock|strong="H5003"\w* and \w shed|strong="H8210"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* are \w judged|strong="H4941"\w*; and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* in \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* and \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*.\f + \fr 16.38 \ft as: Heb. with judgments of\f*

And I will also \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee into their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and they shall throw \w down|strong="H2040"\w* thine eminent \w place|strong="H1354"\w*, and shall break \w down|strong="H5422"\w* thy high \w places|strong="H7413"\w*: they shall \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* thee also of thy \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w fair|strong="H8597"\w* \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w leave|strong="H3240"\w* thee \w naked|strong="H5903"\w* and \w bare|strong="H6181"\w*.\f + \fr 16.39 \ft thy fair…: Heb. instruments of thine ornament\f*

They shall also bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* a \w company|strong="H6951"\w* against thee, and they shall \w stone|strong="H7275"\w* thee with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and thrust thee \w through|strong="H1333"\w* with their \w swords|strong="H2719"\w*.

And they shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* thine \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w* upon thee in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w*: and I will cause thee to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from playing the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, and thou also shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* no \w hire|strong="H0868"\w* any more.

So will I make my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* toward thee to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, and my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w* shall \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from thee, and I will be \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*, and will be no more \w angry|strong="H3707"\w*.

Because thou hast not \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, but hast \w fretted|strong="H7264"\w* me in all these \add things;\add* \w behold|strong="H1887"\w*, therefore I also will \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* upon \add thine\add* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: and thou shalt not \w commit|strong="H6213"\w* this \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* above all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

¶ Behold, every one that useth \w proverbs|strong="H4911"\w* shall use \add this\add* \w proverb|strong="H4911"\w* against thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, As \add is\add* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \add so is\add* her \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

Thou \add art\add* thy \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, that \w lotheth|strong="H1602"\w* her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* and her \w children|strong="H1121"\w*; and thou \add art\add* the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of thy \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, which \w lothed|strong="H1602"\w* their \w husbands|strong="H0582"\w* and their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: your \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \add was\add* an \w Hittite|strong="H2850"\w*, and your \w father|strong="H0001"\w* an \w Amorite|strong="H0567"\w*.

And thine \w elder|strong="H1419"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \add is\add* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, she and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* at thy left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w*: and thy \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* at thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, \add is\add* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.\f + \fr 16.46 \ft thy younger: Heb. lesser than thou\f*

Yet hast thou not \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* after their \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, nor \w done|strong="H6213"\w* after their \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*: but, as \add if that were\add* a \w very|strong="H6985"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \add thing\add*, thou wast \w corrupted|strong="H7843"\w* more than \w they|strong="H2004"\w* in all thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.\f + \fr 16.47 \ft as if…: or, that was lothed as a small thing\f*

\add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* hath not \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, she nor her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, as thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, thou and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

Behold, this was the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*, \w fulness|strong="H7653"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and \w abundance|strong="H7962"\w* of \w idleness|strong="H8252"\w* was in her and in her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, neither did she \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*.

And they were \w haughty|strong="H1361"\w*, and \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me: therefore I took them \w away|strong="H5493"\w* as I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add good\add*.

Neither hath \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w committed|strong="H2398"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*; but thou hast \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* more than \w they|strong="H2007"\w*, and hast \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* thy \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w* in all thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* which thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

Thou also, which hast \w judged|strong="H6419"\w* thy \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* thine own \w shame|strong="H3639"\w* for thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w* that thou hast committed more \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w* than \w they|strong="H2004"\w*: they are more \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w* than thou: yea, be thou \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* also, and \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*, in that thou hast \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* thy \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*.

When I shall bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* their \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w*, the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, and the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, then \add will I bring again\add* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of thy \w captives|strong="H7622"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them:

That thou mayest \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* thine own \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*, and mayest be \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* in all that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, in that thou art a \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* unto them.

When thy \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to their former \w estate|strong="H6927"\w*, and \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to their former \w estate|strong="H6927"\w*, then thou and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to your former \w estate|strong="H6927"\w*.

For thy \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* was not \w mentioned|strong="H8052"\w* by thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w pride|strong="H1347"\w*,\f + \fr 16.56 \ft mentioned: Heb. for a report, or, hearing\f*\f + \fr 16.56 \ft pride: Heb. prides, or, excellencies\f*

Before thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* was \w discovered|strong="H1540"\w*, as at the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \add thy\add* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and all \add that are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* her, the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, which \w despise|strong="H7590"\w* thee round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.\f + \fr 16.57 \ft Syria: Heb. Aram\f*\f + \fr 16.57 \ft despise: or, spoil\f*

Thou hast \w borne|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w lewdness|strong="H2154"\w* and thine \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 16.58 \ft borne: Heb. borne them\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will even \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with thee as thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, which hast \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* the \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* in \w breaking|strong="H6565"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

¶ Nevertheless I will \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with thee in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, and I will \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* unto thee an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

Then thou shalt \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and be \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w*, when thou shalt \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, thine \w elder|strong="H1419"\w* and thy \w younger|strong="H6996"\w*: and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them unto thee for \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, but not by thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.
And I will \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with thee; and thou shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

That thou mayest \w remember|strong="H2142"\w*, and be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, and never \w open|strong="H6610"\w* thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* any more \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of thy \w shame|strong="H3639"\w*, when I am \w pacified|strong="H3722"\w* toward thee for all that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
